attributes.action: Armoured Equipment. To implement the immediate issue of the new protected armoured vehicles for the British Troops serving in Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have far too many deaths to serving servicemen and women, in particular over the past 2 weeks. What makes it worse is that the British public know we have the vehicles but Mr. Brown and his government are not doing anything to get these vehicles out to the troops in Afghanistan. Every day we see the aircraft arrive back, and the courtege through the streets of Wootton Bassett, yet nothing is done. Mr. Brown, do something, or let some one in who can
